item.title: Ringcentral Campus Recruitment 2024
item.description: Ringcentral Interview Experience for SDE-1 (Oncampus) Eligibility Criteria 8.5+ CGPA Ciruit Branches No backlogs Batch of 2025 Qualification Round This was an online test conducted on HackerRank. The test was of 90 minutes and had 2 sections: Section 1: MCQs This section had 5 MCQs. Got questions from Huffman encoding, Hamming code, Time complexity analysis. There was a positive score for correct answers and no negative marking for wrong answers. Section 2: Coding This section had 2 coding questions: It was Leetcode hard-medium level questions.
